titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Cuba should issue a state of apology and agree to cease human rights violations in order for any embargo or economic restraints to be lifted.
Expressing the sense of Congress that Cuba should issue a state of apology and agree to cease human rights violations in order for any embargo or economic restraints to be lifted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Western Hemisphere.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that Cuba should issue a statement of apology and agree to cease human rights violations in order for any embargo or economic restraints to be lifted.
